extendedInfo.description: Control your box with Neutrino or Neutrino HD while you are on the way - or just from your couch:Switching channels, fetching EPG data or Setting and Editing timers - no problem with Neutrino Remote Control

reviews.title: Get it!
reviews.comment: Looks good, setup was super easy. Functions very well.  SO far as min points, the epg is just for one channel. but yeah I do have a tv guide app for that. Only other min point is that I couldnt get the streaming video working, but that being said, at least it didn\'t crash my box like the last software I tried.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This App deleted my bouquets in a way i cannot restore them.->have to reinstall image on my coolstream zee. Btw. use port 80. Was not predefined. :(
reviews.author: A Google User
